title: iPhone for Seniors for Dummies (5th Ed)(gnv64)
description:
iPhone for Seniors for Dummies (5th Ed)
by Nancy C. Muir
For Dummies | November 2015 | ISBN-10: 1119137764 | ePUB | 47.2 mb

Learn to:
-  Stay in touch with email, social media, and FaceTimeÂ® video calling
-  Use the Calendar and Reminder apps to stay on schedule
-  Share photos, read e-books, play games, and listen to music

Get in touch with your iPhone with this fun and friendly guide!
Once you get comfortable with your iPhone, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it. This hands-on, easy-to-use guide helps you navigate the Home screen, make calls, and send texts and emails. You'll learn how to browse the web, share photos, stay organized, and fill your iPhone with games, movies, music, and more!
-  Start it up â€” explore the multitouch interface and get familiar with built-in apps
-  Keep up with the cool kids â€” send texts, set up your contacts, video chat with FaceTime, and choose ringtones
-  Leap online â€” get the latest news, shop online, and explore fun and useful apps
-  Get your fix â€” read news, enjoy iTunesÂ® radio, shoot videos, and watch your favorite movies and TV shows
    Meet your new assistant â€” use Maps, Calendar, Reminders, and Notifications to find things and stay organized

Open the book and find:
-  Simple steps for browsing the Web
-  Tips for syncing your iPhone with iCloudÂ®
-  Just what SiriÂ® can do for you
-  Ways to get social with FaceTimeÂ®, TwitterÂ®, and iMessageÂ®
-  Guidance on getting around with Maps
-  The scoop on working with Calendar and Reminders
-  Tips for troubleshooting common issues
-  Guidelines for maintaining your iPhone

About the Author
Nancy C. Muir is the owner of a writing and consulting company that specializes in business and technology topics. She has authored more than 100 books, including Computers For Seniors For Dummies and iPad For Seniors For Dummies. Nancy holds a certificate in Distance Learning Design and has taught Internet safety at the college level.
